info.name: Halal Mart ApiCollection
info.description:
## **Halal Mart Backend API Collection Description**

The **Halal Mart API** is a RESTful backend service built using **Django REST Framework (DRF)**.

It provides a structured and secure interface for managing all operations of the **Halal Mart eCommerce system**, including user authentication, product management, cart functionality, checkout, payments, and customer reviews.

This API collection enables smooth integration between the frontend and backend, ensuring a complete online shopping experience — from browsing products to placing and reviewing orders.
